name: The Bunny Graveyard (DEMO)
description: Skye and her Handy Pals are looking for a new pal to help them out on her lovely lil' garden! Think you're up for the job? Explore the garden and meet new friends! Dig up some holes, plant some seeds and make those flowers bloom! Have fun with your fellow Handy Pals! Warning: This game contains violent scenes with loud sounds and flashing lights. Get the full game!
